info.title: Members API
info.description: An API which retrieves Members data.

get.summary: Returns a list of locations, both parent and child

parameters.name: locationType
parameters.description: Location by type of location

parameters.name: locationName
parameters.description: Location by name specified

get.summary: Returns a list of constituencies

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Constituencies containing serach term in their name

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip from the first, default is 0

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: The number of records to return, default is 20. Maximum is 20

get.summary: Returns a constituency by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Constituency by ID

get.summary: Returns a synopsis by constituency ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Synopsis by constituency ID

get.summary: Returns a list of representations by constituency ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Representations by constituency ID

get.summary: Returns geometry by constituency ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Geometry by constituency ID

get.summary: Returns a list of election results by constituency ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Elections results by constituency ID

get.summary: Returns an election result by constituency and election id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Election result by constituency id

parameters.name: electionId
parameters.description: Election result by election id

get.summary: Returns latest election result by constituency id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Latest election result by constituency id

get.summary: Returns a list of registered interests

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Registered interests containing search term

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page of results to return, default 0. Results per page 20.

parameters.name: includeDeleted
parameters.description: Registered interests that have been deleted

get.summary: Returns a list of staff

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Staff containing search term

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page of results to return, default 0. Results per page 20.

get.summary: Returns a list of current members of the Commons or Lords

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Members where name contains term specified

parameters.name: Location
parameters.description: Members where postcode or geographical location matches the term specified

parameters.name: PostTitle
parameters.description: Members which have held the post specified

parameters.name: PartyId
parameters.description: Members which are currently affiliated with party with party ID

parameters.name: House
parameters.description: Members where their most recent house is the house specified

parameters.name: ConstituencyId
parameters.description: Members which currently hold the constituency with constituency id

parameters.name: NameStartsWith
parameters.description: Members with surname begining with letter(s) specified

parameters.name: Gender
parameters.description: Members with the gender specified

parameters.name: MembershipStartedSince
parameters.description: Members who started on or after the date given

parameters.name: MembershipEnded.MembershipEndedSince
parameters.description: Members who left the House on or after the date given

parameters.name: MembershipInDateRange.WasMemberOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Members who were active on or after the date specified

parameters.name: MembershipInDateRange.WasMemberOnOrBefore
parameters.description: Members who were active on or before the date specified

parameters.name: MembershipInDateRange.WasMemberOfHouse
parameters.description: Members who were active in the house specifid

parameters.name: IsEligible
parameters.description: Members currently Eligible to sit in their House

parameters.name: IsCurrentMember
parameters.description: Members who are current or former members

parameters.name: PolicyInterestId
parameters.description: Members with specified policy interest

parameters.name: Experience
parameters.description: Members with specified experience

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip from the first, default is 0

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: The number of records to return, default is 20. Maximum is 20

get.summary: Returns a list of members of the Commons or Lords

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Members with names containing the term specified

parameters.name: dateToSearchFor
parameters.description: Members that were an active member of the Commons or Lords on the date specified

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip from the first, default is 0

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: The number of records to return, default is 20. Maximum is 20

get.summary: Return member by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Member by ID specified

parameters.name: detailsForDate
parameters.description: Member object will be populated with details from the date specified

get.summary: Return biography of member by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Biography of Member by ID specified

get.summary: Return list of contact details of member by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Contact details of Member by ID specified

get.summary: Return contribution summary of member by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Contribution summary of Member by ID specified

get.summary: Return list of early day motions of member by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Early day motions of Member by ID specified

get.summary: Return experience of member by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Experience of Member by ID specified

get.summary: Return list of areas of focus of member by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Areas of focus of Member by ID specified

get.summary: Return members by ID with list of their historical names, parties and memberships

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: List of MemberIds to find

get.summary: Return latest election result of member by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Latest election result of Member by ID specified

get.summary: Return portrait of member by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Portrait of Member by ID specified

get.summary: Return portrait url of member by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Portrait url of Member by ID specified

get.summary: Return list of registered interests of member by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Registered interests of Member by ID specified

get.summary: Return list of staff of member by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Staff of Member by ID specified

get.summary: Return synopsis of member by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Synopsis of Member by ID specified

get.summary: Return thumbnail of member by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Thumbnail of Member by ID specified

get.summary: Return thumbnail url of member by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Thumbnail url of Member by ID specified

get.summary: Return list of votes by member by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Votes by Member by ID specified

get.summary: Return list of written questions by member by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Written questions by Member by ID specified

get.summary: Returns current state of parties

parameters.name: house
parameters.description: State of parties in Commons or Lords.

parameters.name: forDate
parameters.description: State of parties for the date specified

get.summary: Returns the composition of the House of Lords by peerage type.

parameters.name: forDate
parameters.description: Composition of the Lords for date specified.

get.summary: Returns a list of current parties with at least one active member.

parameters.name: house
parameters.description: Current parties by house

get.summary: Returns a list of government posts.

parameters.name: departmentId
parameters.description: Government posts by department ID

get.summary: Returns a list of opposition posts.

parameters.name: departmentId
parameters.description: Opposition posts by department ID

get.summary: Returns a list of spokespersons.

parameters.name: partyId
parameters.description: Spokespersons by party ID

get.summary: Returns a list of departments.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Departments by type

get.summary: Returns a list containing the speaker and deputy speakers.

parameters.name: forDate
parameters.description: Speaker and deputy speakers for date specified

get.summary: Returns a list of policy interest.
Returns a list of departments.
Returns a list of answering bodies.
Returns department logo.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Logo by department ID
